name: Tulip Inn Concorde Munich

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked this hotel as part of a motorbike tour. It was easy enough to find, the parking for the motorbike was excellent and the location (very near to the Marienplatz) was excellent. That was about it though. The room was clean (we are in Germany after all) but small. The lack of air conditioning would have been compensated for by the big windows but the amount of rebuilding going on at the hotel put paid to that. Builders starting up at 7:00am was not great. The noise of demolition did little to enhance the experience of staying here.
reviews.title: Great location but that's about it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled solo
reviews.text: Breakfast was a disappointment. Limited amounts of a very poor choice. We chose this place partly on the basis of its claims for its breakfasts. Added to this the lack of coffee/tea making in the rooms and no facility for a drink elsewhere (no soft drinks machine for example) made this a pretty sterile place to be. Ah well.
reviews.title: Simple but Adequate

likes.disliked: — A cleaner coming into my room at 9 am.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed at the Concorde for two nights last month, when I went to Munich to hear some operas. I chose this hotel because of its proximity to the opera house (Bayerische Staatsoper, Nationaltheater), which is less than ten minutes walk from the hotel. Indeed, the Concorde is excellently located. From the airport, you should take an S-Bahn train (S8) to Isartor station (about 40 minutes' ride), from where you can easily walk to the hotel. (But make sure you leave the station by the exit marked as "Thomas-Wimmer-Ring-Tal".) It is also easy to get to other tourist spots, including Marienplatz, either on foot or by S-Bahn.
reviews.title: Best Location in Munich!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled with family
reviews.text: My room was small and simple, but it was quiet, clean and perfectly adequate. Likewise with breakfast--nothing special but quite sufficient for me. The staff were generally efficient. My only quibble is that on the day I was to leave, a cleaner came into my room at 9 am, when I was still in bed. Otherwise, I can recommend the Concorde to those who need simple but adequate accommodation in central Munich.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel, Great LOcation

likes.disliked: — no room safe, small room, basic facilities

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: about two stone throws from the Hofbrauhaus - but on the quiet side by the wimmer ring in a cul-de-sac : easy to walk everywhere AND the Hotel is very freindly, effic ient, and very clean
reviews.title: Right in the centre

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 2 of us stayed here 10-28-11 to 11-5-11. Very satisifed. Short walk to the hotel from the Isartor subway station. We were given our room at 10:30 am which was very much appreciated after an overnight flight from the US. Room was good sized, shower had good water pressure. Other than taking the subway to and from the airport and a day trip to Linderhoff/Neuschwanstein Castles and a half day trip to Dachau we walked everywhere, including the museums and Schwabing area. Breakfast was ok (not fantastic, not bad----scrambled eggs would have been a nice addition). Front desk staff helpfully answered all our questions. A very nice time in a very interesting city. Even with being in Munich for a week we still didn't see everything on our list. My only (minor) complaints were that there is no individual temp control in the room, or a clock. Next time I'll pack a travel clock.
reviews.title: Convenient, Clean, Quiet

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: I was in this hotel with my family for 1 night stay in April 2011. It was very good experience. We have apartment for 4 people. It was small but very modern, clean and comfortable. This hotel has very convenient location. Breakfast was excellent for small European hotel. It was big and very tasty. There is underground small parking under this hotel. It’s important if you travel by car. You can reach parking place using the elevator (together with your car). It was really fun. You will find in this hotel very good service and amicable staff. I highly recommend this hotel and exactly will stay there in future.
reviews.title: Exellent hotel with very good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was quite good for staying. it is very near to the old town and 5 min from the nearest train station. The room was beautiful and looks fine. the lighting of the room was nice and pretty. The hotel staff were friendly and helpful but they have a lack of information regarding the interests of the city.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011
reviews.text: They offered to us a complementary breakfast and it was good.
reviews.title: Great hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The T.V wasnt flat in my room. In addition, they are using normal old keys instead of cards to open the room.
reviews.title: Friendly, helpful staff in a quiet location but so near the city centre

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have been there 12/2/2009.
reviews.title: It was the worst hotel we have ever seen!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was the worst I have ever seen:
reviews.title: Great place to stay near the Munich city center

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 1. The towels had very bad smell, the smell of dried dirty linen.
reviews.title: Adequate

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled with friends
reviews.text: 2. The bed sheet was torn and also was not clean.
reviews.title: Good location, but rooms are ho-hum, lacking security

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: 3. Hairdryer was broken. I asked to repair it, but there was no reaction.
reviews.title: Pleasant & comfortable centrally located hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the hotel for 3 days. The location is good, a couple of blocks from Hofbrauhause 5 minutes away from Marienplatz.
reviews.title: Good location - Indifferent Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The service however, was quite indifferent. The staff did not go out of their way to help at all or there is a bare bones crew on hand. For example, when asked whether there is a cart for the luggage instead of offering to help us with our luggage the response was "Well, there's a cart there, but nobody has really used it." If you walk up to the front desk the person who was there was not moved by my presence to tear himself away from some papers he was reading, even though I was 3 steps away. Only when I called out to him did he seem to notice that I was there. On the other hand, once I managed to attract his attention he gave me the information I needed.
reviews.title: Wow...nearly "perfekt"!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled solo
reviews.text: The hotel does not offer free Internet,which seems to be standard service in many places nor has in-room internet. There is a kiosk style computer with the Internet apparently, but we were not desperate enough to use it, given that we have smart phones.
reviews.title: Great after travelling from Manchester to watch Bayern Munchen.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled on business
reviews.text: The hotel is also on a noisy street, which is understandable given that it is in the center and two blocks from a famous beer house that sits 3,000 people. Once the windows were shut it was quiet enough to sleep if it weren't for lack of air conditioning that made it rather hot. Perhaps they don't use air conditioning in Munich in April.
reviews.title: Quiet spot right off of Marianplatz

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would say that if the price is good, then it is a fair bargain, but if you want a hotel with good service and not trying to save every penny look elsewhere.
reviews.title: Very pleasant, great location

aka: Tulip Inn Concorde Munich Hotel Munich
